alert.note: Alert for Southern Johnson County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Logan and southwestern Johnson Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 556 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Magazine, or 7 miles northeast of Booneville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paris... Magazine... Subiaco... Hartman... Scranton... Hoyt... Hinkle... Midway in Logan County... Lake Dardanelle... Morrison Bluff... Wilkins... Carbon City... Driggs... Corley... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Johnson County; Southern and Eastern Logan County; Western and Northern Logan County
